sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import './Footer.scss'; import lottie from 'lottie-web'; import deadpool from './utils/animation/walking-pumpkin.json'; export function Footer() { useEffect(()=> { lottie.loadAnimation({ container: document.querySelector('.walkingPump1'), animationData: deadpool, renderer: 'svg', loop: true, autoplay: true, rendererSettings: { progressiveLoad: false } }) lottie.loadAnimation({ container: document.querySelector('.walkingPump2'), animationData: deadpool, renderer: 'svg', loop: true, autoplay: true, rendererSettings: { progressiveLoad: false } }) }) return (
